TextView.android:text: The Nagesh Karajagi Orchid College Of Engineering and Technology, Solapur Started in the year 2008-2009 after getting approval from AICTE, New Delhi and recognized by Government Of Maharashtra. It is affilated to Solapur University, Solapur and run by The Pradnya Niketan Education Society, Pune - (PNES). From 2017-18, First Year Engg of UG course is affiliated to the the Centralized Technical University Dr Babasaheb Ambedkar Technological University(BATU), Lonere.
